org.red5.server.api
Interface IGlobalScope

All Superinterfaces:
AttributeStoreMXBean, IAttributeStore, IBasicScope, ICastingAttributeStore, ICoreObject, IEventDispatcher, IEventHandler, IEventListener, IEventObservable, IPersistable, IScope, IServiceHandlerProvider, Iterable<IBasicScope>, ResourceLoader, ResourcePatternResolver
All Known Implementing Classes:
GlobalScope
public interface IGlobalScope
extends IScope

The global scope that acts as root for all applications in a host.

Author:
The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Luke Hubbard (luke@codegent.com)
